summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to taxation; imposing a commercial parking tax; adding a new Chapter 5.35 to Title 5 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending SMC sections 5.30.010, 5.55.010, 5.55.040 A, 5.55.060 A, 5.55.150 E, 5.55.165, 5.55.220, 5.55.230 A, 5.55.260, 3.02.125 A, 6.48.020, and 5.45.090 BB in connection therewith.
